member.name: T:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Providers.AppleAuthProvider
member.summary: Apple Sign-In authentication provider implementation Follows TDD methodology - minimal implementation to make tests pass

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Providers.AppleAuthProvider.GetAuthorizationUrlAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Generates Apple Sign-In authorization URL with client_id, scopes, and state parameters Apple uses form_post response mode for security and requires nonce for id_token validation

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Providers.AppleAuthProvider.ExchangeCodeForTokenAsync(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Exchanges Apple Sign-In authorization code for access and ID tokens Returns mock tokens in TDD GREEN phase - real implementation would call Apple's token endpoint

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Providers.AppleAuthProvider.GetUserInfoAsync(EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Models.TokenResponse)
member.summary: Extracts user information from Apple ID token JWT claims Apple provides user data in id_token rather than a separate userinfo endpoint

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Providers.AppleAuthProvider.GetLoginUrlAsync(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Generates Apple Sign-In login URL - delegates to GetAuthorizationUrlAsync Apple authentication follows standard OAuth 2.0 flow with OIDC extensions

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Providers.AppleAuthProvider.HandleCallbackAsync(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Handles Apple Sign-In callback by exchanging code for tokens and extracting user info Returns standardized EAuthResponse with success/error status and user data

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Providers.AppleAuthProvider.GetLogoutUrlAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Returns logout redirect URL for Apple Sign-In Apple doesn't provide centralized logout - returns local redirect URL

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Providers.AppleAuthProvider.GetPasswordResetUrlAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Apple Sign-In doesn't support direct password reset URLs Users must manage passwords through Apple ID settings

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Providers.AppleAuthProvider.ValidateConfigurationAsync
member.summary: Validates Apple Sign-In configuration including ClientId, TeamId, and KeyId Required for Apple's certificate-based authentication

member.name: T:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Providers.AzureB2CAuthProvider
member.summary: Azure B2C authentication provider implementation Follows TDD methodology - minimal implementation to make tests pass Supports B2C-specific features like custom policies and id_token claims extraction

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Providers.AzureB2CAuthProvider.GetAuthorizationUrlAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Generates Azure B2C authorization URL with custom policy and nonce for OIDC compliance Uses B2C-specific authority endpoint and supports policy-based authentication flows

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Providers.AzureB2CAuthProvider.ExchangeCodeForTokenAsync(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Exchanges Azure B2C authorization code for access token and ID token Returns mock B2C tokens in TDD phase - real implementation calls B2C token endpoint

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Providers.AzureB2CAuthProvider.GetUserInfoAsync(EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Models.TokenResponse)
member.summary: Extracts user information from Azure B2C ID token claims B2C provides user data in id_token JWT rather than separate userinfo endpoint

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Providers.AzureB2CAuthProvider.GetLoginUrlAsync(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Generates Azure B2C login URL with support for custom policies Allows policy override through 'p' parameter for specialized B2C flows

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Providers.AzureB2CAuthProvider.HandleCallbackAsync(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Handles Azure B2C OAuth callback with policy-aware token processing Returns standardized response with B2C-specific error handling and logging

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Providers.AzureB2CAuthProvider.GetLogoutUrlAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Generates Azure B2C logout URL with policy and post-logout redirect Uses B2C-specific logout endpoint for complete session termination

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Providers.AzureB2CAuthProvider.GetPasswordResetUrlAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Generates Azure B2C password reset URL using configured reset policy Returns null if password reset policy is not configured in B2C tenant

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Providers.AzureB2CAuthProvider.ValidateConfigurationAsync
member.summary: Validates Azure B2C configuration including TenantId, ClientId, ClientSecret, and policies Ensures required B2C-specific settings like SignUpSignInPolicyId are configured

member.name: T:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Providers.FacebookAuthProvider
member.summary: Facebook/Meta authentication provider implementation Follows TDD methodology - minimal implementation to make tests pass

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Providers.FacebookAuthProvider.GetAuthorizationUrlAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Generates Facebook OAuth authorization URL using Graph API v18.0 Uses comma-separated scopes format specific to Facebook's OAuth implementation

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Providers.FacebookAuthProvider.ExchangeCodeForTokenAsync(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Exchanges Facebook authorization code for long-lived access token Returns mock token in TDD GREEN phase - Facebook tokens have extended expiry (5183944 seconds)

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Providers.FacebookAuthProvider.GetUserInfoAsync(EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Models.TokenResponse)
member.summary: Creates user info from Facebook access token Returns mock Graph API user data in TDD phase - real implementation queries /me endpoint

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Providers.FacebookAuthProvider.GetLoginUrlAsync(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Generates Facebook login URL - delegates to GetAuthorizationUrlAsync Facebook OAuth follows standard flow with app-specific scopes and permissions

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Providers.FacebookAuthProvider.HandleCallbackAsync(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Handles Facebook OAuth callback with token exchange and user data retrieval Returns standardized response with Facebook-specific error codes and messages

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Providers.FacebookAuthProvider.GetLogoutUrlAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Returns local logout redirect URL for Facebook authentication Facebook doesn't provide centralized logout URL - applications manage sessions locally

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Providers.FacebookAuthProvider.GetPasswordResetUrlAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Facebook doesn't support direct password reset URLs Users must reset passwords through Facebook's own account recovery process

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Providers.FacebookAuthProvider.ValidateConfigurationAsync
member.summary: Validates Facebook OAuth configuration including AppId and AppSecret Uses secure configuration service to verify Facebook app credentials

member.name: T:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Providers.GoogleAuthProvider
member.summary: Google OAuth 2.0 authentication provider

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Providers.GoogleAuthProvider.GetAuthorizationUrlAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Generates Google OAuth 2.0 authorization URL with consent prompt and offline access Delegates to GetLoginUrlAsync for consistency in Google's OAuth implementation

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Providers.GoogleAuthProvider.ExchangeCodeForTokenAsync(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Exchanges Google OAuth authorization code for access and refresh tokens Makes HTTP POST request to Google's token endpoint with client credentials

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Providers.GoogleAuthProvider.GetUserInfoAsync(EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Models.TokenResponse)
member.summary: Retrieves Google user profile information using access token Calls Google's userinfo endpoint and maps to standardized UserInfo model

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Providers.GoogleAuthProvider.GetLoginUrlAsync(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Builds Google OAuth login URL with scopes, state, and custom parameters Uses consent prompt and offline access for refresh token capability

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Providers.GoogleAuthProvider.HandleCallbackAsync(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Processes Google OAuth callback by exchanging code for tokens and retrieving user info Handles errors gracefully with detailed error codes and logging

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Providers.GoogleAuthProvider.GetLogoutUrlAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Returns local logout redirect URL for Google OAuth Google doesn't provide centralized logout - applications handle session cleanup

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Providers.GoogleAuthProvider.GetPasswordResetUrlAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Returns Google's account recovery URL for password reset Google handles password reset through their account recovery system

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Providers.GoogleAuthProvider.ValidateConfigurationAsync
member.summary: Validates Google OAuth configuration including ClientId and ClientSecret Uses secure configuration service to verify required credentials

member.name: T:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Services.ConfigurationService
member.summary: Unified configuration service that implements graceful fallback pattern for secrets and config values Fallback chain: Key Vault Environment Variable App Settings Default Value

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Services.ConfigurationService.GetSecretValue(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves secret values using graceful fallback chain: Key Vault Environment App Settings Default Logs security-aware messages without exposing actual secret values in logs

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Services.ConfigurationService.GetRequiredSecretValue(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves required secret values with validation and detailed error reporting Throws InvalidOperationException with comprehensive source list if secret is not found

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Services.ConfigurationService.GetConfigValue(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves non-sensitive configuration values with Environment App Settings Default fallback Prioritizes environment variables for containerized deployment scenarios

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Services.ConfigurationService.ValidateRequiredSecrets(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Validates multiple required secrets and detects placeholder/test values for security Returns comprehensive error list for configuration validation during startup

member.name: T:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Services.EAuthDatabaseService
member.summary: Implementation of database setup service that auto-configures required database objects

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Services.EAuthDatabaseService.InitializeDatabaseAsync
member.summary: Creates EasyAuth database schema, tables, and stored procedures from embedded SQL scripts Executes initialization scripts in sequence and seeds framework metadata

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Services.EAuthDatabaseService.IsDatabaseInitializedAsync
member.summary: Checks if EasyAuth database is properly initialized by verifying framework_metadata table exists Returns true if core schema and metadata tables are present in the database

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Services.EAuthDatabaseService.ApplyMigrationsAsync
member.summary: Applies pending database migrations to upgrade schema to current version Checks current version and executes version-specific upgrade scripts

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Services.EAuthDatabaseService.GetDatabaseVersionAsync
member.summary: Retrieves current database schema version from framework_metadata table Returns '0.0.0' if metadata table doesn't exist or version is not recorded

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Services.EAuthDatabaseService.CleanupExpiredDataAsync
member.summary: Removes expired sessions and old audit log entries to maintain database performance Deactivates sessions past expiry time and deletes audit logs older than 90 days

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Services.EAuthDatabaseService.ValidateSessionAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Validates session token against database and returns session information if active

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Services.EAuthDatabaseService.InvalidateSessionAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Marks user session as inactive in database for logout functionality

member.name: T:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Services.EAuthProviderFactory
member.summary: Factory for creating and managing authentication providers Follows TDD methodology - minimal implementation to make tests pass

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Services.EAuthProviderFactory.GetProvidersAsync
member.summary: Retrieves all configured and enabled authentication providers from options and custom registrations Checks configuration settings and creates provider instances on-demand with caching

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Services.EAuthProviderFactory.GetProviderAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Gets specific authentication provider by name with caching support Checks custom providers first, then built-in providers, creating instances as needed

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Services.EAuthProviderFactory.GetDefaultProviderAsync
member.summary: Returns the configured default provider or first enabled provider if no default is set Useful for single sign-on scenarios where user doesn't specify provider preference

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Services.EAuthProviderFactory.ValidateProvidersAsync
member.summary: Validates configuration of all registered providers and returns comprehensive validation results Executes provider-specific configuration checks and aggregates success/failure status

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Services.EAuthProviderFactory.GetProviderInfoAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves comprehensive provider metadata including capabilities, login URLs, and configuration Combines provider instance data with static metadata like icons and descriptions

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Services.EAuthProviderFactory.GetAllProviderInfoAsync
member.summary: Gets metadata for all providers including disabled ones for UI configuration purposes Useful for admin interfaces that need to show all possible provider options

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Services.EAuthProviderFactory.RegisterCustomProviderAsync(System.String,EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Services.IEAuthProvider)
member.summary: Registers a custom authentication provider implementation for extensibility Allows applications to add non-standard providers while maintaining factory consistency

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Services.EAuthProviderFactory.GetProviderCapabilitiesAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Returns detailed capabilities for specific provider including supported features and limits Defines what authentication features each provider supports (password reset, linking, etc.)

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Services.EAuthProviderFactory.GetProvidersByCapabilityAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Filters available providers by specific capability (password reset, account linking, etc.) Enables feature-specific provider selection based on application requirements

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Services.EAuthProviderFactory.RefreshProviderCacheAsync
member.summary: Clears provider and health caches to force recreation of provider instances Used when configuration changes require fresh provider instances

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Services.EAuthProviderFactory.GetProviderHealthAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Performs health check on specific provider including configuration validation and response time Caches results for 5 minutes to avoid excessive health check overhead

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Services.EAuthProviderFactory.GetAllProviderHealthAsync
member.summary: Executes health checks for all registered providers and returns aggregate health status Useful for monitoring dashboards and system health endpoints

member.name: T:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Services.EAuthService
member.summary: Main authentication service implementation This is a minimal stub implementation following TDD approach: Tests are written first, then this stub allows compilation, then proper implementation follows in GREEN phase

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Services.EAuthService.GetProvidersAsync
member.summary: Retrieves list of configured authentication providers with their status and capabilities Currently returns mock Google provider in TDD GREEN phase - will be enhanced to query all configured providers

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Services.EAuthService.InitiateLoginAsync(EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Models.LoginRequest)
member.summary: Initiates authentication flow by generating provider-specific login URL Validates provider and generates state parameter for OAuth security - currently supports Google only in TDD phase

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Services.EAuthService.HandleAuthCallbackAsync(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Processes OAuth callback by validating parameters and simulating successful authentication TDD GREEN phase returns mock user data - will be enhanced to delegate to specific providers

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Services.EAuthService.SignOutAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Signs out user by invalidating their session in the database Calls database service to mark session as inactive and logs the operation

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Services.EAuthService.GetCurrentUserAsync
member.summary: Retrieves current authenticated user information from session context TDD stub implementation - returns not authenticated status until proper session management is implemented

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Services.EAuthService.ValidateSessionAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Validates active user session by checking database and expiry status Delegates to database service for session verification and returns standardized response

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Services.EAuthService.LinkAccountAsync(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Links additional authentication provider to existing user account TDD stub implementation - will enable multi-provider account linking in future iterations

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Services.EAuthService.UnlinkAccountAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Removes authentication provider link from user account TDD stub implementation - will enable provider unlinking with proper validation in future iterations

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Services.EAuthService.InitiatePasswordResetAsync(EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Models.PasswordResetRequest)
member.summary: Initiates password reset flow for providers that support it TDD stub implementation - will delegate to provider-specific password reset URLs when implemented

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Services.EAuthService.GetUserProfileAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves user profile information by user ID for StandardApiController TDD stub implementation - returns basic profile information for authenticated users

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Services.EAuthService.RefreshTokenAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Refreshes JWT access token using refresh token for StandardApiController TDD stub implementation - returns mock refresh result for valid tokens

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Services.EAuthService.InitiateAuthenticationAsync(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initiates OAuth authentication flow for StandardApiController TDD stub implementation - generates OAuth authorization URLs for supported providers

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Services.EAuthService.SignOutUserAsync(System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal)
member.summary: Signs out user using ClaimsPrincipal for StandardApiController TDD stub implementation - clears session for authenticated users

member.name: T:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Services.IConfigurationService
member.summary: Provides unified configuration lookup with Key Vault/environment variable fallback pattern This service abstracts the complexity of looking up secrets from multiple sources

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Services.IConfigurationService.GetSecretValue(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets a configuration value with fallback chain: Key Vault Environment Variable App Settings Default
member.param: Optional environment variable name to check
Optional default value if not found anywhere
member.returns: The configuration value or null if not found

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Services.IConfigurationService.GetRequiredSecretValue(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets a required configuration value with fallback chain, throws if not found
member.param: Optional environment variable name to check
member.exception: Thrown when the required value is not found

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Services.IConfigurationService.GetConfigValue(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets a regular configuration value (non-secret) with environment variable fallback
member.param: Optional environment variable name to check

member.name: M:EasyAuth.Framework.Core.Services.IConfigurationService.ValidateRequiredSecrets(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Validates that all required secrets are configured
member.param: Dictionary of secret keys and their descriptions
member.returns: List of validation errors, empty if all secrets are valid
